    • getVariable

      <V extends IValue, T extends IValueType<V>> IAspectVariable<V> getVariable(PartTarget target, S partState, IAspectRead<V,T> aspect)
      Get the singleton variable for an aspect.
      Type Parameters:
      V - The value type.
      T - The value type type.
      Parameters:
      target - The target block.
      partState - The state of this part.
      aspect - The aspect from the part of this state.
      Returns:
      The variable that exists only once for an aspect in the given part state.
